name: Vintage
description: Nostalgic, retro design with sepia tones and classic typography
ai_style_prompt: Enhance with warm sepia tones, gentle film grain, slightly faded colors, and vintage photography feel.
quote_pool: Some old-fashioned things like fresh air and sunshine are hard to beat.
The best things in life are the people you love and the memories you make.
Time flies, but memories last forever.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Love is the whole thing. We are only pieces.
Remember tonight... for it is the beginning of always.
We didn't realize we were making memories, we just knew we were having fun.
The most beautiful things are not associated with money; they are memories and moments.
